DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in the United States of America (USA). The purpose of this study is to determine if the use of insulin detemir in combination with insulin aspart is safe and at least as effective as insulin glargine in combination with insulin aspart for the control of blood glucose in patients with Type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Insulin Detemir With Insulin Glargine in Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 2 Diabetes for more than 12 months Currently treated with glucose lowering tablets or insulin HbA1c: 7.012.0%
